subject: My first ITC recording
author: michael markowicz
full_text:
--0-73596672-1175645822=:81382

--0-538688831-1175645822=:81382
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

This is my first ITC recording. I used a 6 inch pvc tube, a speaker in one end playing random short wave radio frequencies and a microphone in the other. I had spent a good deal of time in Plymouth Mass at Burial Hill where some Pilgrims are buried when this was recorded. 
 
---------------------------------
